name: 簡伽蓉
objective: 教導學生閱讀囊括全球議題的文章，並藉由文章的內容作技巧的訓練，字彙的建構，語言的解析，及思維的啟發。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
schedule:
Week 1	Orientation
Week 2	Unit 1—First Impressions and Attraction: Reading
Week 3	Unit 1: Reading / Listening
Week 4	Unit 1: Writing
Week 5	Unit 2—The Web of Life: Listening
Week 6	Unit 2: Reading / Listening
Week 7	Unit 2: Speaking
Week 8	Review
Week 9	Midterm exam and Proficiency Test
Week 10	Unit 3—Stress and Health: Reading
Week 11	Unit 3: Reading / Listening
Week 12	Unit 3: Writing
Week 13	Unit 4—Folktales: Listening
Week 14	Unit 4: Reading / Listening
Week 15	Unit 4: Reading / Listening
Week 16	Unit 4: Speaking
Week 17	Review
Week 18	Final Exam and Proficiency Test
scorePolicy:
A.Grades through the whole semester 70%:
Midterm Exam 13%, Final Exam 15%, Oral Test 12% Quizzes 30%
B.Proficiency Test (Midterm) 15%
C.Proficiency Test (Final) 15%
materials: Academic Connections 1  by Betsy Cassriel & Marit ter Mate-Martinsen  (Pearson)
